name: purchases
description: This table contains all cart purchases.

columns.name: discount_code
columns.description: Discount code that was used by a user. It's a foreign key for the `discount_codes` table.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country of a user who made a purchase (IP based).

columns.name: city
columns.description: City of a user who made a purchase (IP based).

columns.name: payment_method
columns.description: Payment method that was used for a purchase. Could be **cc** (credit card) or **paypal**.

columns.name: cart_id
columns.description: ID of a cart that was purchased.
